author: Thanuris
description:
Basic Marisa combos focusing on the easiest
routes to get limit/knockdown.

Unlike other characters, Marisa only has
one (hard) universal ground combo so this pack
will show various character specific routes
to knockdown off dial A (5aaaa).
name: Basic Combos

scenarios.description:
5aaaa Spell
-------
This will be the combo that you'll use
the most as Marisa since it works with most
of her spells.
scenarios.name: Starting out

scenarios.description:
j5a j8a(2) j6c j66 (j5a) j6a
Works anywhere
-------
Unlike her ground combos, Marisa's air combos
are very lenient and have lots of different
routes.J8a is the best j5a followup for
consistency since you can always limit off it
with this combo.
scenarios.name: BnB air combo 1

scenarios.description:
(j5a) j6a j6c j66 j6a/j6[a]
Near corner/corner only
-------
Easy combo to do off a j6a starter, j6[a] is
the ideal finisher if possible for more damage.
scenarios.name: BnB air combo 2

scenarios.description:
j2a j5c j66 j6a j6c
Midscreen and near corner only
-------
Consistent combo off a j2a starter, very
useful to limit off j44 j2a crossups and
midscreen hj9 j2a BE catches.
scenarios.name: BnB air combo 3

scenarios.description:
5aaa 5b hj9 j5a j2a j5c j66 j2[a]/j6[a]
Anywhere but corner, MU specific
5aaa 5b hj9 j5a j2a j5c j66 j6a
Alternative version
-------
Midscreen BnB with corner carry and good
okizeme time.
scenarios.name: Midscreen Tall Characters

scenarios.description:
d6 5aaaa hj9 j5a j2a j5c j66 j6a
Anywhere but corner, MU specific
-------
Unlike most other characters, Marisa is forced
to use links in her BnB ground combos for some
MU, so you have to get used to the input
timing after 5aaaa.
scenarios.name: Midscreen Short Characters

scenarios.description:
(j5a) j2a j2c jd3 j6a
Corner only
-------
Marisa's most common border escape catch combo
j2b can be used instead of j214b as a finisher
for better okizeme.
scenarios.name: Corner ground j2a

scenarios.description:
f5a 6b hj9 j5a j6a j6c j66 j6a
AUB Corner only, works versus everyone
-------
Most common AUB scenario, also works with a
third hit of dial A starter instead of f5a.
scenarios.name: Corner AUB 1

scenarios.description:
4a/5a 6b hj9 j5a j2a j2c jd3 j6a
Corner only
-------
Second most common AUB scenario, sometimes
drops depending of distance because of 6b
bullets hitting too fast.
scenarios.name: Corner AUB 2

scenarios.description:
CH j214b j6c j66 j6a j214b
Works at specific heights, needs lvl1+ j214b
-------
Marisa's default 214b, also called "broomride"
is her hardest hitting starter and scariest
neutral tool. It has long untech on CH
so j6c can be held until your opponent is at
the proper height to finish this combo.
scenarios.name: Broomride 1

scenarios.description:
j214b Luminous Strike
Works anywhere
-------
Simple combo to get a knockdown and decent
damage off lvl0 no CH broomride.
Luminous Strike can be used to make broomride
safe on block so this combo can also be used
as a BE catch blockstring.
scenarios.name: Broomride 2

scenarios.description:
j8a j5c j2d Gravity Beat
Corner and near corner only
-------
This combo is very important for players who
use Gravity Beat because it ignores the
spell cancel proration thus it does absurd
damage for its cost.
scenarios.name: Gravity Beat 1

scenarios.description:
623c Gravity Beat
Works anywhere
-------
Another common way to combo Gravity Beat
but the spell needs to be used before
Marisa leaves the ground.
scenarios.name: Gravity Beat 2

scenarios.description:
5aaa 5b hj9 j5a j2a j2c j66 j2a
Corner only, MU specific
-------
Corner combo that leads well into airtech
baits after the first j2c to do air pressure
afterwards.
scenarios.name: Corner Tall Characters

scenarios.description:
5aaaa 2a 3a (5b/6b) 623b | Corner only
Drops against Patchouli, Suika
Reisen, Cirno
--------
Good combo to get consistent limit without
having to learn character specific routes,
B bullets after 3a are optional.
scenarios.name: Corner (almost) Universal

scenarios.description:
(j5a) j8a(1) Dragon Meteor
Works anywhere
-------
Easiest way to confirm Dragon Meteor.
It can also be comboed off j2a and j6a.
scenarios.name: Dragon Meteor

scenarios.description:
CH 623b Gravity Beat
Works anywhere
All the 623B CH combos only work in Dust Storm
-------
Another example of how to combo Gravity Beat
ignoring chain spell proration.
scenarios.name: Dust Storm

scenarios.description:
j214b j6c j44 j6c j214b
Works anywhere, height dependant
-------
CH Broomride optimal combo for maximum damage.
Requires a precise j44 cancel between each j6c.
scenarios.name: Broomride Optimal

scenarios.description:
5aaa 5b hj9 j5a j2a j5c j66 delay j2a j214
Anywhere but corner, MU specific
-------
Highest damage Marisa can get meterless in
midscreen.
Bad okizeme afterwards.
scenarios.name: Midscreen Tall Characters Max Damage

scenarios.description:
(j5a) 5aaa 5b hj9 j5a j2a j2b(2/3) jC j66 j6a
Corner only, Okuu only
-------
Hardest hitting Marisa's meterless ground
corner combo, this version only works on Okuu
with some variations it can work on other tall
characters like Iku but they are far harder
to do.
scenarios.name: Corner Okuu Only Optimal

scenarios.description:
CH j8a(1) j5[C] j2d land Gravity Beat
Works anywhere, requires timing for max damage
-------
By far the best use of Gravity beat damagewise
this combo does more damage than some 5cost
spells of other characters.
To consistently get the j8a CH, you can force
the Dust Storm weather.
scenarios.name: Gravity Beat EX

scenarios.description:
5aaaa delay 66a d214b
Works anywhere, only universal ground combo
-------
Marisa sadly has no meterless combo routes
against short characters in midscreen without
links so learning to do this combo
consistently is your top priority to become a
decent Marisa player.
scenarios.name: Most Important Combo to Practice
